participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and supportive, Ryan has a passion for music and exploration. He tends to be optimistic and is always eager to encourage others.
participant_1.background: I also like kittens. Brownies are my favorite dessert. I like things that explode. I work in the military. I have been all over the world.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Sophia is a dreamer who believes in following her heart. She is open and expressive, with a love for music and a desire to connect with others.
participant_2.background: I dropped out of college a month ago. I wear my heart on my sleeve. Some call me a hopeless romantic. I live in my foreign car outside Los Angeles.

content.text: I'm sorry to hear that you dropped out of college. What made you decide to do that?
I just wasn't feeling it anymore. I wanted to experience more of life and I felt like college was holding me back.
I can understand that. I've felt that way before too. What are you doing now?
I'm living in my foreign car outside of Los Angeles. I'm working on building my own business and I'm also trying to make it as a musician.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're doing what you love.
Thanks! I'm really enjoying it.
I've always wanted to be a musician. I play the guitar, but I'm not very good at it.
That's okay! Everyone starts out somewhere.
I know, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough to make it as a musician.
You don't have to be the best to make it. You just have to be passionate about it and be willing to work hard.
I think I'm ready to give it a try.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement.
You're welcome!
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of music. I'm mostly into rock and blues, but I also like to play some jazz and country.
That's awesome! I love all of those genres of music.
Me too! I think they're all so great.
I have a feeling we're going to be friends.
I think so too!
What are your favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, the Doors, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love the Beatles and the Rolling Stones.
Me too! I think they're two of the best bands of all time.
I agree! They're both so iconic.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! I think it's going to make hanging out a lot more fun.
I agree
